## lookat variable

Creates a mat4 view matrix from given `eyePos`<!-- -->, `target` and `up` vector.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lookat: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn3<"vec3", "vec3", "vec3", "mat4">
```
